description:
Hildegard is a Flame Haze with the title "Handler of Dark Ravens". She maintains a contract with http://anidb.net/ch43514 [Wodan], the Crimson Lord with the true name "Harbinger of Sorcery", which in turn resides in a brooch-shaped vessel called Hliðskjálf.
Source: shakugan.wikia.com
name: Hildegard
